summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing acquisition of an easement for construction, operation and maintenance of a watermain with appurtenances in tract 25, Upper and Renick's Belt-Line Addition, King County, Washington, from Wilhelm R. Farnum and providing payment therefor by appropriation from the Water Fund and authorizing sale and conveyance of certain City (Water Department) property in Tract 21, Upper and Renick's Belt-Line Addition, King County, Washington, at its appraised valuation, to said Wilhelm R. Farnum.
